By Kung Fu Hare on Thursday, June 8, 2000 - 08:10 am:

Now, I'm pretty sure that all Phoenix run away, but, does it come back or is it gone for good? Please help me ^_^

By torey_luvullo on Thursday, June 8, 2000 - 08:33 am:

there was a rumor when the game first came out that they came back after 100 yrs. now, however, with hundreds of trainers having raised phoenixes and having carried on their ranches for more than 100 years after the phoenix flew away, i think we can say with certainty:

PHOENIXES DO NOT RETURN
